es.situm.sdk.communication

Annotation Type CommunicationOptions


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
public @interface CommunicationOptions
    Options used in CommunicationManager. If multiple values are set the options will take priority in this order: FORCE_DOWNLOAD, SERVER_FIRST, CACHE_FIRST

    • Field Detail

      • FORCE_DOWNLOAD

        public static final String FORCE_DOWNLOAD
        Force download from server, the cache won't be used. The value in the options map must be a boolean. Default value is false

      • SERVER_FIRST

        public static final String SERVER_FIRST
        Force to go to the server. If the server is not responding or there is no internet connection it will use the cache. The value in the options map must be a boolean. Default value is false

      • CACHE_FIRST

        public static final String CACHE_FIRST
        Force to use cache even if it's too old. If there is not cache available it will try to make the request. The value in the options map must be a boolean. Default value is false

      • PRELOAD_IMAGES

        public static final String PRELOAD_IMAGES
        Preload the images when you are downloading an object that contains them like Floor or PoiCategory. The value in the options map must be a boolean Default value is true
